p: A literature search was conducted on PubMed, Scopus, Cochrane database, and Google Scholar using the terms “surgical masks,” “masks,” “N95 respirators,” “powered air-purifying respirators,” “respirators,” “respiratory viruses,” “respirators/PPE reuse,” “respirators/PPE disinfection,” and “healthcare workers.” From the 25 top-cited articles, 15 were selected for relevance and impact.
